abstract: Fried Frank Harris Shriver & Jacobson, one of the law firms advising Dow Jones as it considers a takeover bid from News Corporation, said Friday it hired a new corporate partner for its mergers and acquisitions practice. John E. Sorkin, previously a partner at Latham & Watkins, joins Fried Frank in its New York office.
lead_paragraph: Fried Frank Harris Shriver & Jacobson, one of the law firms advising Dow Jones as it considers a takeover bid from News Corporation, said Friday it hired a new corporate partner for its mergers and acquisitions practice. John E. Sorkin, previously a partner at Latham & Watkins, joins Fried Frank in its New York office.
